name: Clean Clone
description:
Buckle up, clone! Time to clean up the mess other people made, as always. Erase the corruption in each level using your tools to get to the bottom of the problem! CONTROLS:

SPACE > SKIP DIALOG

WASD > MOVE

CLICK > CLEAN UP (PEOPLE TOO)

Q > PLACE BOMB

R > RESET

WHEEL > ZOOM IN/OUT

F > FULLSCREEN

CREDITS:

Made by Felipe Llorca and Julian Santiago Cuello for the 7 Days Roguelike Celebration.

BUGS:

- If you die, game breaks, you'll need to F5. This does not happen in the downloadable version.

- If you get to second biome and press restart, game goes back to level one but stays on same biome.
